name: Jerma Rancher
description:
A "Monster Rancher" like game with Jerma985 references.

Feed and train your Jerma-lore based monster and win in the arena with it

Answer Jerma Trivia when a Jerma Clone visits your ranch

Create and discover all the 16 monsters

If you're a Jerma fan, why not try it out?

Played with Keyboard

Made With:

Unity

Paint Tool Sai

The Jerma Voiceline Emporium

Freesound

Audacity

Music from bensound.com
